description: Conversion in Luke and Paul: Some Exegetical and Theological Explorations. Doctoral thesis, Durham University. MOXON, JOHN,RICHARD,LEWIS (2011) PETER’S HALAKHIC NIGHTMARE: THE ‘ANIMAL’ VISION OF ACTS 10:9-16 IN JEWISH AND GRAECO-ROMAN PERSPECTIVE.
title: Conversion in Luke and Paul: Some Exegetical and Theological Explorations
